Wanderers (Age of Sigmar) [960pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Wanderers) [960pts]

    • Leader [240pts]

      • Nomad Prince [80pts]

        Categories: AELF, HERO, NOMAD PRINCE, ORDER, WANDERERS, Leader

        Command Abilities: Lord of the Deepwood Host, Unit: Nomad Prince, Unit Abilities: Deepwood Shield, Eye Thief, Weapon: Hunting Hawk's Beak, Starlight Spear


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Lord of the Deepwood Host If a Nomad Prince uses this ability, then until your next hero phase you can re-roll all hit rolls of 1 for WANDERER units from your army that are within 8" of him when they attack.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Nomad Prince 6"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deepwood Shield You can re-roll any failed save rolls for a Nomad Prince.
        Eye Thief If an enemy model suffers any wounds from a Hunting Hawk’s Beak and is not slain, the hawk has pecked out one of its eyes. For the rest of the battle, your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit roll made for the affected model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Hunting Hawk's Beak Missile20"14+4+-1
        Starlight Spear Melee2"43+3+-12

      • Wayfinder [80pts]

        Categories: AELF, HERO, WAYFINDER, ORDER, WANDERERS, Leader

        Command Abilities: Bravest of the Brave, Unit: Wayfinder, Unit Abilities: Hail of Doom Arrow, Weapon: Greatbow, Hunting Falcon's Beak, Kindred Blade


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bravest of the Brave If a Wayfinder uses this ability, then until your next hero phase, WANDERERS from your army that are within 18" of him in the battleshock phase may use his Bravery instead of their own. In addition, if you roll a 1 for any of these units’ battleshock tests, that unit can immediately shoot as if it were the shooting phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Wayfinder 6"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Hail of Doom Arrow Once per game, a Wayfinder can fire its Hail of Doom Arrow during your shooting phase. When he does so he makes 3D6 attacks with his Greatbow that phase instead of 3.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Greatbow Missile20"33+3+-11
        Hunting Falcon's Beak Missile18"14+4+-1
        Kindred Blade Melee1"33+4+-1

    • Battleline [120pts]

      • Glade Guard [120pts]

        Selections: 10 Glade Guard [120pts]

        Categories: AELF, GLADE GUARD, ORDER, WANDERERS, Battleline

        Unit: Glade Guard, Unit Abilities: Arcane Bodkins, Lord's Bowman, Peerless Archery, Weapon: Glade Blade, Longbow


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Glade Guard 6"166+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcane Bodkins Once per game, this unit can fire enchanted arrows called arcane bodkins in your shooting phase instead of their normal arrows. If they do, the Rend of their Longbows is -3 until the end of that phase.
        Lord's Bowman The leader of this unit is the Lord’s Bowman. A Lord’s Bowman makes 2 attacks rather than 1 with his Longbow.
        Peerless Archery You can add 1 to all hit rolls made for a unit of Glade Guard in the Shooting phase if it has 20 or more models and there are no enemy models within 3".
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Glade Blade Melee1"15+5+-1
        Longbow Missile20"14+4+-1

    • Other [100pts]

      • Wild Riders [100pts]

        Selections: 5 Wild Riders [100pts]

        Categories: Other

        Unit: Wild Riders, Unit Abilities: Unbound Fury, Weapon: Hunting Spear, Steed's Horns and Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Wild Riders 12"275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Unbound Fury Wild Riders can run and charge in the same turn. You can add 1 to any wound roll made for a Wild Rider’s Hunting Spear if it charged during the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Hunting Spear Melee2"23+4+-1
        Steed's Horns and Hooves Melee1"24+4+-1

    • Battalion [160pts]

      • Battalion: Waystone Pathfinders [160pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Protective Volley, Realm Wanderers


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Protective Volley In your hero phase, pick one enemy unit within 12" of the battalion's Nomad Prince. All other Waystone Pathfinder units can immediately make a shooting attack against that unit as if it were the shooting phase.
        Realm Wanderers Instead of setting up the units in this battalion on the battlefield, you can place them to one side. In your first movement phase, set up all of these units wholly within 6" of the edges of the battlefield, and more than 9" from any enemy models. This is each unit's move for that movement phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Wanderers

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Defiant Hunters, Melt Away, Realm Wanderers


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Defiant Hunters You can re-roll battleshock tests for friendly WANDERERS units.
        Melt Away Friendly WANDERERS units can retreat and still shoot later in the same turn.
        Realm Wanderers At the start of your movement phase, one friendly WANDERERS unit wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield can leave to travel along a hidden pathway instead of making a move. If they do so, remove the unit from the battlefield. Then set the unit up, anywhere wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield by which it left, and more than 9" from any enemy models. This counts as that unit’s move for that movement phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [240pts]

      • Endless Spell: Geminids of Uhl-Gyish [60pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, GEMINIDS OF UHL-GYSH, HYSH, ULGU, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Geminids of Uhl-Gyish, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Hysh, Empowered by Ulgu, Fly, Predatory, Tendrils of Shadow and Light, Unleashed


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Geminids of Uhl-Gyish 7If successfully cast, set up both models within 6" of each other and both wholly within 18" of the caster. You must then nominate one model to be the Light Geminid and the other to be the Shadow Geminid.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Hysh If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Light, you can re-roll the dice to determine the number of mortal wounds suffered by a unit that has any models passed across by the Light Geminid.
        Empowered by Ulgu If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Shadow, you can re-roll the dice to determine the number of mortal wounds suffered by a unit that has any models passed across by the Shadow Geminid.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory Geminids of Uhl-Gysh is a predatory endless spell. They can move up to 8" and can fly. When you move this endless spell, the second model must finish its move within 6" of the first. If this is impossible, this spell is dispelled.
        Tendrils of Shadow and Light After the Shadow Geminid model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 (to a minimum of 1) from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round. A unit is not affected by the Shadow Geminid model if it has been passed across by the Light Geminid model earlier in the same battle round. After the Light Geminid model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round. A unit is not affected by the Light Geminid model if it has been passed across by the Shadow Geminind model earlier in the same battle round (a unit can be affected by one or other of the models each battle round, but not both). Malign Sorcery; Errata, July 2018
        Unleashed When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.

      • Endless Spell: Quicksilver Swords [30pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, CHAMON, QUICKSILVER SWORDS, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Quicksilver Swords, Unit Abilities: Dancing Blades, Empowered by Chamon, Fly, Predatory, Volley of Blades


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Quicksilver Swords 6If successfully cast, set up a Quicksilver Swords model wholly within 10" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Dancing Blades After this model has moved, you can pick 1 unit within 6" of it and roll 12 dice. For each roll of 6+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the unit being rolled for is a CHAOS unit, it suffers 1 mortal wound for each roll of 5+ instead.
        Empowered by Chamon If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Metal, you can roll 15 dice for this model’s Dancing Blades ability instead of 12.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory Quicksilver Swords is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Volley of Blades When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.

      • Endless Spell: Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws [30pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, GHUR, RAVENAK'S GNASHING JAWS, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Ghur, Endless Appetite, Fly, Predatory, Ravening Hunger


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws 8If successfully cast, set up a Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws model wholly within 6" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Ghur If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Beasts, this model can move up to D6+12" instead of 12".
        Endless Appetite When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 12" and can fly.
        Ravening Hunger After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of each unit that each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round.

      • Endless Spell: Shards of Valagharr [40pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, SHARDS OF VALAGHARR, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Shards of Valagharr, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, Ensnaring Soul-drain, Twilight Translocation


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Shards of Valagharr 5If successfully cast, set up the first Shards of Valagharr model wholly within 6" of the caster, and then set up the second Shards of Valagharr model wholly within 12" of the first.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, the first Shards of Valagharr model can be set up wholly within 12" of the caster, instead of 6".
        Ensnaring Soul-drain At the start of the movement phase, draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between the closest parts of the bases of the two Shards of Valagharr models from this endless spell. Each unit passed across by this line is ensnared until the end of that turn. Halve the Move characteristic of a unit that is ensnared. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by units that are ensnared.
        Twilight Translocation At the start of the battle round, after determining who has the first turn, the players must roll off. The winner can remove one Shards of Valagharr model from this endless spell from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 12" of the other Shards of Valagharr model from this endless spell.

      • Endless Spell: Soulscream Bridge [80pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SOULSCREAM BRIDGE, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Soulscream Bridge, Unit Abilities: Deathly Passage, Empowered by Shyish, Nightmarish Construct


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Soulscream Bridge 6If successfully cast, set up the first Soulscream Bridge model wholly within 6" of the caster, and then set up the second Soulscream Bridge model wholly within 12" of the first.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deathly Passage At the start of your movement phase, friendly units wholly within 6" of one Soulscream Bridge model from this endless spell can travel across the Soulscream Bridge. If they do so, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 6" of the other Soulscream Bridge model from this endless spell, more than 9" from any enemy units. That unit cannot make a normal move that phase.
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, the second Soulscream Bridge model can be set up wholly within 24" of the first, instead of within 12" of the first.
        Nightmarish Construct Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of a Soulscream Bridge model. This ability has no effect on DEATH units.

    • Scenery [100pts]

      • Scenery: Penumbral Engine [100pts]

        Categories: PENUMBRAL, PENUMBRAL ENGINE, SCENERY, STORMVAULT

        Unit Abilities: Deteriorating State, Repercussion of the Necroquake


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deteriorating State At the start of each battle round after the first, roll a dice. On a 1-4 nothing happens. On a 5 or 6 the function that currently applies to all PENUMBRAL terrain features is replaced with the other function (see ‘Repercussions of the Necroquake’).
        Repercussion of the Necroquake At the start of the first battle round, after determining who has the first turn, roll a dice and consult the table on the right to determine which function all PENUMBRA terrain features on the battlefield gain for the duration of the battle.

        1-3: Orrey of Obfuscation: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target units wholly within 12" of any Penumbral terrain features.

        4-6: Orrey of Illumination: At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point if any friendly HEROES are within 12" of any PENUMBRAL terrain features.
